item.title: Borderlands 4 – Amon gameplay overview
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Get to know Amon the Forgeknight.

Publisher 2K and developer Gearbox Software have released the Amon gameplay overview trailer for Borderlands 4.

Here are the latest details, via 2K:

If you love running headfirst into battle, soaking up damage and dishing it out in equal measure, you’d do well to check out Amon. In addition to being a resilient frontliner, Amon has a mechanically complex set of Action Skills with primary and secondary functions that’ll leave room for experimentation, even with the most experienced players.

In the Amon gameplay overview, you can watch Amon tear his enemies asunder with an arsenal of Forgeweapons, which take form via the Forgedrones stored within Amon’s cybernetic-enhanced beefcake body. Amon can attack or defend as needed, ready to pulverize enemies with a Forgehammer, slice them in twain with Forgeaxes, soak up damage with a Forgeshield, and much, much more.

Borderlands 4 is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on September 12, followed by Switch 2 on October 3.
